Html:
Hi everyone,

I am new to uiautomation and powershell.
Can anyone please tell me how to select the address bar and enter any site's url. I am using google chrome .

Thanks in advance.

Hi,
oppositely to IE and FF, Chrome is an almost closed-box application. That means that Chrome doesn't generally expose its inner controls.
However, there is a tip on how to turn on accessibility: https://uiautomation.codeplex.com/discussions/451074 (the last answer).
You could turn it on constantly or temporarily, via a command-line parameter or its config in GUI.
